name: SamTrans Way2Go Pass
description: FREE unlimited bus pass; transit support for eligible students
fullDescription: SamTrans is San Mateo County's public transit bus service. The Way2Go Pass program provides free unlimited transit for eligible college students through SparkPoint centers.
whatTheyOffer:
- FREE unlimited SamTrans bus pass
- Valid on all SamTrans routes
- Additional transit support services available
- Helps students access education and employment
howToGetIt:
1. Must be enrolled at a participating college (Skyline, Ca√±ada, CSM)
2. Visit your campus SparkPoint center
3. Complete program intake and eligibility verification
4. Receive Way2Go pass loaded on Clipper card
